mapper.sql: f.OrderNum, f.FCreateTime, f.FUpdateTime, f.FStatus, f.TType, f.FCustomer, f.FExplanation, f.FMakeBillsPersoID, f.FMakeBillsTime, f.FCheckFlag, f.FCheckPersonID, f.FCheckTime, f.SalesOrder_ID
OrderNum, FCreateTime, FUpdateTime, FStatus, TType, FCustomer, FExplanation, FMakeBillsPersoID, FMakeBillsTime, FCheckFlag, FCheckPersonID, FCheckTime, SalesOrder_ID
mapper.update:
update
set OrderNum = #{OrderNum}, FUpdateTime = #{FUpdateTime}, TType = #{TType}, FCustomer = #{FCustomer}, FExplanation = #{FExplanation}, SalesOrder_ID = SalesOrder_ID where SalesOrder_ID = #{SalesOrder_ID}
mapper.select: select top 1 , case when f.FCustomer is null or f.FCustomer='' then '' else isnull(f1.FName,'无名称') +'/'+isnull(f1.FNum,'无编号') end FCustomerJoint ,f1.FAddress, f2.NAME FStaffName,f4.NAME FCheckName from f left join KM_Customer f1 on f.FCustomer=f1.Customer_ID left join OA_STAFF f2 on f.FMakeBillsPersoID=f2.STAFF_ID left join OA_STAFF f4 on f.FCheckPersonID=f4.STAFF_ID where f.OrderNum = #{OrderNum}

select , case when f.FCustomer is null or f.FCustomer='' then '' else isnull(f1.FName,'无名称') +'/'+isnull(f1.FNum,'无编号') end FCustomerJoint, f2.NAME FStaffName,
f4.NAME FCheckName from f left join KM_Customer f1 on f.FCustomer=f1.Customer_ID left join OA_STAFF f2 on f.FMakeBillsPersoID=f2.STAFF_ID left join OA_STAFF f4 on f.FCheckPersonID=f4.STAFF_ID
where 1=1
and f.OrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS_OrderNum}+'%'
and f.FStatus in ${pd.KEYWORDS_FStatus}
and ( f1.FName LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS_FCustomer}+'%' or f1.FNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS_FCustomer}+'%' )
[fhstart] order by FCreateTime desc [fhend]

choose.when:
update
set FCheckTime = #{FCheckTime}, FCheckPersonID = #{FCheckPersonID}, FCheckFlag = #{FCheckFlag} where SalesOrder_ID = #{SalesOrder_ID}

update
set FCheckTime = '', FCheckPersonID = '', FCheckFlag = #{FCheckFlag} where SalesOrder_ID = #{SalesOrder_ID}

mapper.select:
select isnull(count(*),0) RepeatNum from f where 1=1 and OrderNum=#{OrderNum}
and f.SalesOrder_ID !=#{SalesOrder_ID}
select distinct FStatus from f where 1=1

select top 100 OrderNum from f where 1=1
and ( OrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%'
)
order by f.OrderNum
mapper.update: update c set c.FStatus= case when isnull(( select count( * ) FNUM from PP_PlanningWorkOrder f1 where 1=1 and SalesOrderDetailID IN ( select SalesOrderDetail_ID from PP_SalesOrderDetail f2 where 1=1 and f2.SalesOrderID=f.SalesOrderID and f2.RowClose='N' ) ),0) >0 then '执行' ELSE '新建' END from PP_SALESORDERDETAIL f inner join PP_SalesOrder c on f.SalesOrderID=c.SalesOrder_ID where 1=1 and f.SalesOrderDetail_ID=#{SalesOrderDetailID}

update f set f.ProductionQuantity= isnull(( select sum( isnull(FCount,'0') ) FNUM from PP_PlanningWorkOrder f1 where 1=1 and SalesOrderDetailID=f.SalesOrderDetail_ID ),0) from PP_SALESORDERDETAIL f where 1=1 and f.SalesOrderDetail_ID=#{SalesOrderDetailID}
